title: Compare horizontal asymptotes of various functions

content.question:
For which of the following does <math> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>∞</mi> </mrow> </munder> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4310@</annotation> </semantics> </math>?

I. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mn>99</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40A8@</annotation> </semantics> </math>

II. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>x</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mi>ln</mi><mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4016@</annotation> </semantics> </math>

III. <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mrow> <mn>99</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>x</mi> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4004@</annotation> </semantics> </math>

topic.text: 1.15: Connecting Limits at Infinity and Horizontal Asymptotes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
